verses.esv: 27 And just as it is appointed for man to die once, and after that comes judgment,
verses.kjv: 27 And as it is appointed unto men once to die, but after this the judgment:
verses.niv: 27 Just as man is destined to die once, and after that to face judgment,

verses.esv: 8 Yes, we are of good courage, and we would rather be away from the body and at home with the Lord.
verses.kjv: 8 We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
verses.niv: 8 We are confident, I say, and would prefer to be away from the body and at home with the Lord.
